btv.event.torrent

Class TorrentEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • btv.event.torrent.TorrentEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TorrentEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
    This class will be used to relay torrent information to a client which is using TorrentListeners.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • TorrentEvent

        public TorrentEvent(java.lang.Object source,
            java.lang.String name1,
            int down1,
            int numConnections,
            java.lang.String bytes)
        Constructor to set up a new TorrentEvent.
        Parameters:
        source - The source of the event.
        name1 - The name of the Torrent associated with this event.
        down1 - The percent of the Torrent downloaded at the time of this event occuring.
        numConnections - The number of connected peers this torrent has when this event occurs.
        bytes - The number of bytes the torrent has downloaded when this event occurs.
